title: 'We are pushing the frontier across our entire AI stack': Microsoft's latest results show new cloud and AI returns - but reliance on OpenAI causes concerns

title: AI is Rewriting How Consumers Discover Brands and Raising the Stakes for Experience and Loyalty
description: NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)--AI’s growing influence is reshaping how people discover and evaluate brands. Discovery is shifting upstream, attention is getting more expensive, and digital experiences are now judged in seconds. New data from Contentsquare’s 2026 Digital Experience Benchmarks, based on 99 billion sessions analyzed, shows that as journeys shorten and expectations rise, even small experience improvements can make the difference between fleeting visits and lasting loyalty.
